title: Transportation: Train (Usefulness 4)
description: Traveler usefulness 4/10 phrases for the Train subcategory within Transportation. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: The bullet train is slowly losing speed.
cards.romaji: Shinkansen ga yukkuri to sokudo o otoshite iku.
cards.japanese: 新幹線がゆっくりと速度を落としていく。
